code: @Transactional("txManager1") @Test public void transactionalTest() {     assertEquals(1, txManager1.begun).     assertEquals(1, txManager1.inflight).     assertEquals(0, txManager1.commits).     assertEquals(0, txManager1.rollbacks). }

@AfterTransaction public void afterTransaction() {     assertEquals(1, txManager1.begun).     assertEquals(0, txManager1.inflight).     assertEquals(0, txManager1.commits).     assertEquals(1, txManager1.rollbacks). }
